mapper.select: select s.id, s.`name` from housinginfo s where s.deleteStatus = false and s.`code` like CONCAT(#{code},'%')
select max(code) from housinginfo d where d.parent_id = #{parentId}
select h.*, p.token, p.name as parentName from housinginfo h join propertyinfo p on h.parent_id = p.id where h.id = #{id}

select *, p.print_name as printName from housinginfo h left join printinfo p on h.id = p.department_id
and h.`code` LIKE CONCAT(#{parentCode},'%')
and h.parentId #{parentId}
and h.deleteStatus = false
